name: FMapPlayerKeyArgs
doc: Arguments that can be used when mapping a player key

MappingName:
The name of the mapping for this key. This is either the default mapping name from an Input Action asset, or one
that is overridden in the Input Mapping Context.
Slot: What slot this key mapping is for
NewKey: The new Key that this should be mapped to
HardwareDeviceId: An OPTIONAL specifier about what kind of hardware this mapping is for.
ProfileId: The Key Mapping Profile identifier that this mapping should be set on. If this is empty, then the currently equipped profile will be used.
bCreateMatchingSlotIfNeeded: If there is not a player mapping already with the same Slot and Hardware Device ID, then create a new mapping for this slot.
bDeferOnSettingsChangedBroadcast: Defers setting changed delegates until the next frame if set to true.
